subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: A toxicology report showed that Sahel Kazemi, the 20-year-old woman the police say fatally shot the former N.F.L. star Steve McNair before killing herself, had a trace amount of marijuana in her body.
snippet: A toxicology report showed that Sahel Kazemi, the 20-year-old woman the police say fatally shot the former N.F.L. star Steve McNair before killing herself, had a trace amount of marijuana in her body.
